comments.body: ditto re. above comment on an example of an expected value.
since the expected value is just a name of valid vsphere spbm policy, which is just a string name like `goldpolicy`, I am not sure how much would that be useful here in this message.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +131,135 @@	It("verify dynamic provision with spbm policy on clustered datastore", func() {
		storagePolicy := os.Getenv("VSPHERE_SPBM_POLICY_DS_CLUSTER")
		Expect(storagePolicy).NotTo(BeEmpty(), "Please set VSPHERE_SPBM_POLICY_DS_CLUSTER system environment")
		scParameters[SpbmStoragePolicy] = storagePolicy
		invokeValidPolicyTest(f, client, namespace, scParameters)
